definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: So we urge that the lawmaking era should be transmitted to a new era of serious enforcement of law.
sentences.chinese: 因之，首倡應由立法時代過渡到嚴肅執法時代。

sentences.english: Initiated by the oppressed class of human rights will always be the treasures of all mankind.
sentences.chinese: 由被壓迫階級首倡的人權，永遠是全人類的珍寶。

sentences.english: At present, the academia in China disagree on the issue who is the initiator of indoctrination theory.
sentences.chinese: 目前，學術界對“灌輸論”的首倡者看法不一。

sentences.english: Advoctogether withes vociferously support one position or the other .
sentences.chinese: 首倡者叫囂着支持其中的一個立場。

definition: to propose/to put forward (an idea)/to initiate
to build (for the first time)/to create (a building)
priority/sth advocated first/refers to ancient tradition: Worship the river first, then the sea.
lit. floating wine goblets on a stream/the origin (of some phenomenon)
first person to be appointed to a post
